experiences.title: Data Scientist Co-op
experiences.subtitle: FM Global
workDescription: Transformed complex raw data sets into a streamlined and organized format, resulting in a 50% reduction in data processing time.
Analyzed data from over 1000 insured equipment units to identify the top 10% riskiest units, allowing the company to prioritize risk mitigation efforts and reduce potential losses by 15%.

Identified patterns in historical data on machinery losses, enabling the development of predictive models that reduced claims processing time by 20% and improved accuracy in identifying potential risks.
Created over 200 visualizations using PowerBI for equipment data to accurately depict the state of machinery, identify losses, and correlate statistical losses to actual financial loss.
Implemented a data analysis algorithm in Python to determine the percentage contribution of each factor to the total loss, resulting in a comprehensive understanding of risk factors.

experiences.title: Undergraduate Trainee
experiences.subtitle: Bharat Heavy Electrical Limited
workDescription: Responsible for mixing the correct composition of metals for using in the foundry.
Checking and maintaining the correct temperature for the heating the metals in the foundry.
Recording the types of metals present in the inventory of the site and reporting the details to site engineer.
Observing and learning the different types of processes and methods used in the foundry.
